# Diona
[color=#008000]Dionae are enabled for character creation.[/color]
Dionae are a large tree looking species, very minimally resembling a human.
## Ability Differences
- Take less blunt damage. - Take less slash damage. - Take much more heat damage. - Take more shock damage. - Are much slower.
## Physical Differences
- Have lots of markings. - Have no hair.
